title: GRACE KARIN Women's Gorgeous Pencil Dress Cap Sleeve Tweed Pencil Dress for Work
description: FEATURES: women dress, bodycon pencil dress; 50s style; cap sleeves; v-neck; back zipper; tweed plaid pattern, slim fit, strechy fabric
Elegant & Stylish: The slim cutting and suitable length will make you more elegant and stylish. The buttock wrap is the perfect way to show off the curves of your body.
Occasion: Suit for formal and casual occasions. Perfect for office, evening party, wedding, birthday, church, club, meeting, dating, cocktail, family gathering and outdoor occasions
Zip Closure: The invisible zipper design on back, not only beautiful, but also very convenient to put on or take off, in particular, putting on this dress after makeup won't ruin your look
Size: Please read our size chart images carefully (Not the Amazon Size Chart). Machine Wash and iron carefully in low temperature
